Sentencas: Biomass gasification involves the production of a gaseous fuel by partial oxidation of a solid fuel.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Clean synthesis (syn) gas, produced from partial combustion of biomass, can be burnt in a gas turbine combustion chamber to run a biomass based combined cycle power plant.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A thermochemical model has been developed to predict the gas composition and performance of a biomass gasifier based on thermodynamic equilibrium concept for different biomass materials.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A simplified numerical method is applied to solve the thermochemical equilibrium reactions.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The system consists of a pressurized circulating fluidized bed to produce the syn gas from the biomass.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effect of the relative air fuel ratio (RAFR), steam fuel ratio (SFR), and gasifier pressure has been examined on the gas composition, gasifier temperature, lower heating value of syn gas, and exergy efficiency of biomass gasifier to obtain a high yield from the biomass.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It has been found that at lower values of RAFR and SFR, the heating value of the syn gas and the exergy efficiency of gasifier is high.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Analysis of a Gas Turbine Cycle Integrated With Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
